document.full_text: renault  chief operating officer patrick pelata resigned on monday, taking the flak for the embarrassing fiasco that started as a probe into suspected industrial espionage case and ended as a fraud case.
document.title: renault coo quits after spy debacle audit
lines_and_colors: renault  chief operating officer patrick pelata resigned on monday, taking the flak for the embarrassing fiasco that started as a probe into suspected industrial espionage case and ended as a fraud case.
